ScenarioDef.label: Stranded Illithid
ScenarioDef.description: You had grand machinations in the works, but it all came tumbling down when your ship suddenly got torn apart by a mere chunk of rock. Now you are stuck on a backwater rimworld with the bare necessities and a single thrall. But while this may be a setback, the lack of jurisdiction offers you a very special opportunity.

scenario.summary: One crashlanded Illithid and one human thrall.

li.text:
It could never be easy, could it?

It was all going so well too, with you managing to "convert" someone to help you with your schemes. But then some accursed chunk of space debris severely damaged your ship, forcing you to evacuate with only your thrall and the bare necessities for survival. Now you are stuck on some backwater rimworld, with only an inferior being for company and almost no possessions to your name.

But while this certainly ruined your carefully constructed plans, this planet offers quite the unique opportunity. The disorganized factions on this planet are ripe for enthrallment and conversion, and no one can stop you if you have enough firepower to assert yourself. Perhaps, if you play your cards right, this would not be so much of a setback after all.
